About Bella Pizza & Subs

Bella Pizza & Subs has been serving the Atlantic Beach community with delicious, authentic pizza and subs. We're proud to offer fresh ingredients, handcrafted pizzas with the perfect crust-to-sauce ratio, and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. Whether you're dining in, ordering for delivery, or picking up takeout, we guarantee you'll love every bite. Cash only - we accept cash payments for all orders.

Venice Italian Kitchen

Authentic Italian Cuisine in Atlantic Beach

Call Now: (252) 499-9642 Get Directions
★★★★★ 4.7 stars (337 reviews)

$$ • Italian Restaurant

Welcome to Venice Italian Kitchen

Located in the heart of Atlantic Beach, Venice Italian Kitchen brings the authentic flavors of Italy to the North Carolina coast. We serve traditional Italian dishes made with fresh ingredients and time-honored recipes. From our signature marinara sauce to our handcrafted pizzas and pastas, every meal is prepared with passion and care.

Our cozy restaurant offers both dine-in and takeout options, perfect for enjoying Italian comfort food whether you're planning a romantic dinner or a family gathering.
